name: Spider Shot (A1phaAant)
description:
This is my first entry to Trijam,

Spider Shot is a game, where an insanely accurate ant eating, venom spitting spider seeks to gain as many meals(points) as possible. WASD to move, use your mouse to aim and shoot.

*DO NOT FULLSCREEN*

Post your top score in the comments + any feedback, I'd really appreciate it.
